slide.title: Checking for errors
slide.blurb: So far, we have not checked for whether inserts worked.

div.example:
<?php
$m = new Mongo;
$c = $m->demo->talks;

try {
    $c->insert(
        array( '_id' => 'derickr' ), // document
        array( 'safe' => true )      // options
    );
} catch ( Exception $e ) {
    echo $e->getMessage(), "\n";
}
?>
